posts.post_content:
T206 Wheat with the following flaws. Corner wear, 17 or 19 in ink on the upper back, two wrinkles into shoulder on the left side of the card and a wrinkle into the bat just above the top hand-$120.00 (sold-$115.00)

S/h is $4.50. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family.
